010package imagingbook.pub.color.filters;
011
012import java.awt.Color;
013import java.util.Arrays;
014
015import imagingbook.lib.filter.GenericFilterVector;
016import imagingbook.lib.image.data.PixelPack;
017import imagingbook.lib.math.VectorNorm;
018
019/**
020 * Sharpening vector median filter for color images implemented
021 * by extending the {@link GenericFilterVector} class.
022 * @author W. Burger
023 * @version 2020/12/31
024 */
025public class VectorMedianFilterSharpen extends GenericFilterVector {
026        
027        public static class Parameters extends VectorMedianFilter.Parameters {
028                /** Sharpening factor (0 = none, 1 = max.) */
029                public double sharpen = 0.5;
030                /** Threshold for replacing the current center pixel */
031                public double threshold = 0.0;  
032                
033                /** For testing only */
034                public boolean showMask = false;
035                /** For testing only */
036                public boolean markModifiedPixels = false;
037                /** For testing only */
038                public Color modifiedColor = Color.black;
039        }
040        
041        private final Parameters params;
042        private final CircularMask mask;
043        private final int maskCount;
044        private final int[][] maskArray;
045        private final int xc, yc;
046        private final float[][] supportRegion;          // supportRegion[i][c] with index i, color component c
047        private final VectorNorm vNorm;
048        private final int a;                                            // a = 2,...,n
049        private final float[] modColor;
050        private final float[] pTmp = new float[3];      // check, adapt to depth
051        
052        /** For testing only */
053        public int modifiedCount = 0;
054        
055        public VectorMedianFilterSharpen() {    
056                this(new Parameters());
057        }
058        
059        public VectorMedianFilterSharpen(Parameters params) {
060                this.params = params;
061                this.mask = new CircularMask(params.radius);
062                this.maskCount = mask.getCount();
063                this.maskArray = mask.getMask();
064                this.xc = this.yc = mask.getCenter();
065                this.supportRegion = new float[maskCount][3];
066                this.a = (int) Math.round(maskCount - params.sharpen * (maskCount - 2));
067                this.vNorm = params.distanceNorm.create();
068                
069                this.modColor = params.modifiedColor.getRGBColorComponents(null);
070                if (params.showMask) Utils.showMask(this.mask, "Mask-" + this.getClass().getSimpleName());
071        }
072        
073        @Override
074        protected float[] doPixel(PixelPack pack, int u, int v) {
075                float[] pCtr = pack.getVec(u, v);
076                getSupportRegion(pack, u, v);
077                double dCtr = trimmedAggregateDistance(pCtr, a); 
078                double dMin = Double.MAX_VALUE;
079                int jMin = -1;
080                for (int j = 0; j < supportRegion.length; j++) {
081                        //float[] p = supportRegion[j];
082                        double d = trimmedAggregateDistance(supportRegion[j], a);
083                        if (d < dMin) {
084                                jMin = j;
085                                dMin = d;
086                        }
087                }
088                float[] pmin = supportRegion[jMin];
089                // modify this pixel only if the min aggregate distance of some
090                // other pixel in the filter region is smaller
091                // than the aggregate distance of the original center pixel:
092                float[] pF = new float[3];                      // the returned color tupel
093                if (dCtr - dMin > params.threshold * a) {       // modify this pixel
094                        if (params.markModifiedPixels) {
095                                copyPixel(modColor, pF);
096                                modifiedCount++;
097                        }
098                        else {
099                                copyPixel(pmin, pF);
100                        }
101                }
102                else {  // keep the original pixel value
103                        copyPixel(pCtr, pF);
104                }
105                return pF;
106        }
107        
108        private void getSupportRegion(PixelPack src, int u, int v) {
109                //final int[] p = new int[3];
110                // fill 'supportRegion' for current mask position
111                int k = 0;
112                for (int i = 0; i < maskArray.length; i++) {
113                        int ui = u + i - xc;
114                        for (int j = 0; j < maskArray[0].length; j++) {
115                                if (maskArray[i][j] > 0) {
116                                        int vj = v + j - yc;
117                                        float[] p = src.getVec(ui, vj, pTmp);
118                                        copyPixel(p, supportRegion[k]);
119                                        k = k + 1;
120                                }
121                        }
122                }
123        }
124        
125        private double trimmedAggregateDistance(float[] p, int a) {
126                if (a <= 1) {
127                        return 0;       // aggregate distance of rank 1 is always zero
128                }
129                final int N = supportRegion.length;
130                final double[] R = new double[N];
131                for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
132                        R[i] = vNorm.distance(p, supportRegion[i]);
133                }
134                if (a < N) {
135                        Arrays.sort(R); // only sort if the rank is less than N
136                }
137                double d = 0;
138                for (int i = 1; i < a; i++) {
139                        d = d + R[i];
140                }
141                return d;
142        }
143
144}
